resources.string: Something went wrong while playing local video! Please try again
Something went wrong while sharing local video! Please try again

- How to save video from __appName__ to the device: 
Everything is very simple! 
 
On the main Download tab of Video Downloader For TikTok 
select and click on the __appName__ icon, if the program is installed, 
it will open and we can start saving the video, 
otherwise we will be asked to install it. 
 
Going to TikTok, when viewing a video tape, select the video you want to save. 
Click the share button, and share the link with our application. We will do everything ourselves. 
 
More details: 
After opening the ticks, select the video you like, press the button 
"share -> ðŸ”—" select Video Downloader For __appName__ from the list, 
if the link is received, we can see it in the address field 
- Click the download video button. 
 
 
- The option is more complicated: 
- Open Video Downloader 
- Add the link manually in the input field 
- Click the download video button. 
 
- The video download is displayed in the Android alert. 
- After downloading, we can open the video for playback. 
- We can transfer the video to another application. 
 
 
- Where the video is saved:
We cannot allow to download videos form this website.
Open the folder with the file
Selected video will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Simply copy the link of localVideo to start download
